content: In the context of LLVM used by rustc, I encounted a bug, an infinite loop in llvm/lib/CodeGen/BranchFolding.cpp, under OptimizeBranches. I can't send it over - this rustc modification for a new codegen feature. Now if I take the dumped this LLVM IR from rustc and pass it directly to llc, it compiles successfully. I expected that with the dumped IR I would get the same infinite loop as I got when rustc tries to compile this crate. Is it possible that I need to pass special args to llc to mimick the same way the backend is invoked by rustc?
